main event: A UFO sighting was reported involving a disc-shaped object hovering and moving erratically in the sky.
interesting points: The object was silver and emitted a deep humming sound., It was observed to move around erratically displaying bright lights., The object accelerated and vanished towards the east in seconds., Witnesses included civilians in Newport, Arkansas, and a TV engineer who viewed it through a high-powered telescope., There was speculation that the object could be a weather balloon.
